metadata.title: CVE-2024-22368 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
The Spreadsheet::ParseXLSX package before 0.28 for Perl can encounter anout-of-memory condition during parsing of a crafted XLSX document. Thisoccurs because the memoize implementation does not have appropriateconstraints on merged cells.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-22368` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspreadsheet-parsexlsx-perl - 0.29-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libspreadsheet-parsexlsx-perl package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.29-1').
